hero.title: About FOUNRS
hero.subtitle: Automation architects for the modern enterprise
hero.description: We're not just another automation agency. We're system architects who specialize in building enterprise-grade automation foundations that scale with your business.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded by experienced system architects and automation specialists, FOUNRS was created to bridge the gap between simple workflow tools and enterprise automation needs. We've seen too many businesses struggle with fragile automations that break at scale.

principles.title: Systems Thinking
principles.description: We approach automation as system architecture, not individual workflows

principles.title: Production First
principles.description: Every solution is built with monitoring, error handling, and scalability from day one

principles.title: Long-term Partnership
principles.description: We're invested in your long-term success, not just project completion

cta.title: Ready to work with automation experts?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can build your automation foundation
